title: Scrims (Empericon E-Sports)
body:
Looking for OOL, OCS, OPL and upcoming teams to scrim with tonight (10/10) and consistently on future dates. Any team that can scrim today shoot me a message (im the coach) and i'll put your team in the list. Everybody should be ready by 5.00 AEST.

For anybody with questions concerning scrimming please conntact me directly.
